ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cooked and cubed ham, or to taste
1 (12 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce, or to taste
1 (8 ounce) bottle ranch dressing, or to taste

cookingTips: Slice potatoes thinly and cook them until crispy on the edges for better texture contrast
Cook bacon and beef separately to manage timing and prevent overcrowding
Toss warm potatoes with barbecue sauce before combining with other ingredients for better flavor absorption
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This warm salad has multiple meat components. How would you ensure all elements finish cooking at the same time?
